name: Undead Frostbite Ruler
text: You can Normal Summon this card without tributing, but if you do its ATK becomes 0. Once per turn, you can target 1 "Frostbite" monster you control, reveal i DARK Ritual Monster in your hand, the targeted monster becomes the same Level as the revealed monster. You can only Special Summon "Frostbite" monsters the turn this effect is activated.
